Create static endpoints. Create statefullset by configuring endpointPrefix in spec.  Pods should get created with predefined static endpoints.

Create static endpoints. Create statefullset by configuring endpointPrefix in spec.  Pods should get created with predefined static endpoints. Now scale up statefullset. New replicas should get created and should use predefined endpoints.
Create static endpoints. Create statefullset by configuring endpointPrefix in spec.  Pods should get created with predefined static endpoints. Now scale down statefullset.

Create static endpoints. Create statefullset by configuring endpointPrefix in spec. Pods should get created with predefined static endpoints.  Delete one instance. It should get created with same static endpoint.
Create static endpoints. Try creating pods, replication controller by configuring endpointPrefix in annotation. Pods should remain in pending state.

Don't create static endpoints. Create  statefullset by configuring endpointPrefix in annotation in spec file.  Pods of statefullset should remain in pending state. Now create static endpoints. Pods should go into running state.
